Name: ShootingStar
Notes: A shooting star that releases Star Bits when it hits the ground. It will periodically reappear until all of its Star Bits have been collected.

Obj_arg0.Name: Star Bits per Iteration
Obj_arg0.Description: How many Star Bits should be released at max per iteration. Default is 5.

Obj_arg1.Name: Spawn Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: The spawn delay of the individual shooting stars in seconds. Default is 240.

Obj_arg2.Name: Falling Distance
Obj_arg2.Description: From how far up it will fall down. Default is 2000.

Obj_arg3.Name: Number of Total Star Bits
Obj_arg3.Description: How many Star Bits can appear in total. Default is 5.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
